job_description:
BIM Modeler

GRID Engineering Services is seeking a skilled BIM Modeler to join our team in Trivandrum. As a BIM Modeler, you will work on a variety of international projects, contributing to the creation of detailed construction drawings and 3D models. Your role will be crucial in ensuring project accuracy and efficiency through collaboration with architects and engineers.

Contact: hr@grdeng.com

Location: Technopark, Trivandrum

Responsibilities:

  • Creating detailed construction drawings.
  • Developing 3D models.
  • Collaborating with architects and engineers to ensure project accuracy and efficiency.
  • 3D Model Creation: Prior experience and expertise in creating ID architectural models.
  • Drafting drawings in collaboration with structural and architectural projects.
  • Translating architectural / Structural drawings and concepts into precise digital models.
  • Coordinating with the interdisciplinary BIM process and clash detection.
  • Extracting plans and detailed drawings.
  • Updating and revising models based on design changes and feedback.
  • Ensuring model accuracy and consistency throughout the project lifecycle.
  • Working closely with architects, engineers, and other project team members.
  • Coordinating with other disciplines (structural, MEP) to ensure model compatibility.
  • Participating in BIM coordination meetings.
  • Generating construction documents, drawings, and schedules from the BIM model.
  • Producing detailed shop drawings for fabrication and construction.
  • Adhering to BIM standards and protocols.
  • Implementing and maintaining BIM execution plans.
  • Ensuring model quality control.
  • Managing and organizing BIM data.
  • Extracting data for quantity take-offs, cost estimation, and other analyses.
  • Identifying and resolving modeling conflicts and clashes.
  • Troubleshooting technical issues related to Revit software.

Qualifications:

  • BE/BTech/ Diploma in Civil Engineering
  • 4+ years’ work experience in Architectural/Structural BIM Modelling
  • Excellent is Architectural ID Drawings
  • Proficiency in BIM Software
  • Skilled in family creation, extracting plans & other documentation
  • Efficiency in 3D Modelling and Clash checking
  • Ability to handle rendering & visualization tools
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
  • Skilled in Dynamo development is an added advantage.

Preferred Skills:

  • Developing and managing 3D Architectural & Structural models using Revit.
  • Exceptional understanding of BIM processes.
  • Basic knowledge of rendering and visualization tools (Lumion, Enscape, Twinmotion)

Salary:

  • Between 25,000 to 60,000 (Based on skills and experience).

Company Information:

  • Grid Engineering Services
  • Nila, Technopark Phase I, Technopark Rd, Technopark Campus, 695581
  • https://gridengineeringservices.com

Important Dates:

  • Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025
  • Job Published: 30, Aug 2025
summary: Join GRID Engineering Services as a BIM Modeler, creating detailed construction drawings and 3D models. The role requires 4+ years of experience and proficiency in BIM software.

job_description:
Structural Engineer/ Checker

Grid Engineering Services Nila, Technopark Phase I, Technopark Rd, Technopark Campus, 695581 https://gridengineeringservices.com

Closing Date: 30, Sept 2025 Job Published: 30, Aug 2025 Contact Email: hr@grdeng.com

Brief Description

The Structural Engineer/ Checker will lead and oversee the rebar detailing team, ensuring accurate, efficient, and timely production of rebar shop drawings and schedules. This role requires a deep understanding of rebar detailing practices, industry standards, and project requirements, coupled with the ability to check the drawings, optimize workflows, manage the team, and deliver high-quality drawings.

Qualifications:

  • BE/BTech in Civil Engineering.
  • Minimum of 3-5 years of experience as a structural engineer expertized in shop drawing checking.
  • Strong understanding of rebar detailing codes and standards.
  • Proficiency in rebar detailing software (e.g., AutoCAD, CADS RC, ZW CAD, Rebar CAD etc).
  • Excellent communication in English and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Skills

  • Possess a strong understanding of rebar detailing standards and procedures to meet the quality.
  • Review and approve shop drawings and schedules for accuracy, completeness, and compliance with project specifications.
  • Assign tasks, set performance expectations, and supervise the rebar detailing team.
  • Stay updated on the latest industry standards and technologies related to rebar detailing.
  • Monitor project progress and ensure timely delivery of shop drawings and schedules.
  • Communicate effectively with clients to understand their requirements and address their concerns.

Location: Technopark, Trivandrum

Salary: Between 25,000 to 60,000 (Based on skills and experience).
summary: Grid Engineering Services is hiring a Structural Engineer/Checker to lead a rebar detailing team. The role involves ensuring accurate and timely production of shop drawings and schedules.

job_description:
Bilagos Softwares (P) Ltd - Senior Full Stack Developer (.NET, Angular)

We are seeking a skilled Senior Full Stack Developer with expertise in .NET (C#, ASP.NET Core) and Angular to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have experience building scalable web applications, integrating APIs, and working across both front-end and back-end technologies.

Location: Trivandrum Experience: 7-10 years

Contact Email: hr@bilagos.in

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust, scalable web applications using .NET and Angular.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, QA, and product managers.
  • Develop RESTful APIs and integrate third-party services.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
  • Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging.
  • Optimize applications for maximum performance and scalability.
  • Maintain and improve existing codebases and peer review code changes.
  • Ensure security and data protection in applications.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • 7+ years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer.
  • Strong experience with .NET Core / ASP.NET MVC / Web API.
  • Proficiency with Angular 15+ (or later versions), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
  • Experience with Entity Framework or other ORM tools.
  • Good understanding of SQL Server and writing complex queries/stored procedures.
  • Familiarity with RESTful API development and integration.
  • Knowledge of Git or other version control systems.
  • Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Additional Details:

  • Candidates with a minimum of 7+ years of software development experience, preferably in a product company, will be prioritized.
  • The ideal candidate will be able to work directly with the Norwegian team.
  • The ideal candidate will be a strong team player and is also able to work independently when required.
  • We are looking for immediate joiners or candidates with a notice period of less than 30 days.
  • Interested candidates should send their resumes to email to hr@bilagos.in with the subject "Senior Full Stack Developer ".
  • Visit https://semine.com/en/ for more details.
summary: Bilagos Softwares is looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer with .NET and Angular experience. The role involves designing and developing scalable web applications and integrating APIs.

job_description:
R&D Manager – Software Development

Bilagos Softwares (P) Ltd

Module No. 2802, 8th Floor Yamuna, SEZ IT Building, Phase III Campus, Technopark, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695583

http://www.bilagos.com

Closing Date: 13, Oct 2025

Job Published: 29, Aug 2025

Contact Email: hr@bilagos.in

Brief Description

We are looking for an experienced and motivated R&D Manager to lead and grow a high-performing software development team. This role is central to realizing our product strategy and advancing our technological ambitions. As R&D Manager, you will ensure effective execution of development initiatives, foster a strong engineering culture, and drive cross-functional collaboration across the company.

Location: Trivandrum

Experience: 9 to 12 years

Department: Research & Development

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead and manage a team of software developers, ensuring alignment with company goals and product strategy.
  • Build and maintain an inclusive, high-performing development team through mentoring, skills development, and performance management.
  • Oversee the execution of software development projects, ensuring on-time delivery and adherence to project timelines.
  • Facilitate agile practices, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.
  • Drive continuous improvement through adoption of DevOps practices and agile methodologies.
  • Collaborate closely with Product, Design, and other departments to ensure seamless integration of R&D efforts into the broader organization.
  • Monitor key R&D metrics and adjust plans to meet strategic goals.
  • Promote a culture of innovation, accountability, and collaboration.

Educational Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related technical field.

Preferred Skills

  • Minimum 9 years of experience in software development, with at least 2 years in a leadership or managerial role.
  • Strong understanding of R&D processes and software development life cycles, preferably in a DevOps or agile environment.
  • Preferred experience in .Net along with hands-on experience in Microsoft/Azure.
  • Proven expertise in managing end-to-end R&D processes and a deep understanding of software development life cycles.
  • Strong project management skills with a focus on delivering quality outcomes on time.
  • Excellent communication skills in English and a proactive attitude.

Additional Details:

  • The ideal candidate will be able to work directly with the Norwegian team.
  • We are looking for immediate joiners or candidates with a notice period of less than 30 days.
  • Interested candidates should send their resumes to email to hr@bilagos.in with the subject line "R&D Manager - Software Development ".
  • Visit https://semine.com/en/ for more details.
summary: Bilagos Softwares is seeking an experienced R&D Manager to lead a software development team in Trivandrum. The role involves driving innovation, managing projects, and fostering collaboration to achieve company goals.

job_description:
Graphic Designer

Techstas Info Solutions (P) Ltd is seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Graphic Designer to join our creative team. We are passionate about merging technology and creativity to deliver compelling visual experiences. This role is perfect for someone who excels in visual storytelling, has a strong grasp of motion graphics, and stays ahead of the curve with the latest design and AI tools.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and produce high-quality visual content across digital and print platforms.
  • Edit and enhance videos with compelling motion graphics and animations.
  • Create eye-catching posters, thumbnails, and other visual materials that align with brand guidelines.
  • Utilize AI-powered design tools to optimize workflows and improve creative output.
  • Stay updated on the latest design trends, tools, and best practices.
  • Collaborate with marketing, development, and product teams to meet project goals and deadlines.

Preferred Skills/Requirements:

  • 4+ years of professional experience in graphic design, motion graphics, or a related field.
  • Strong proficiency in design and editing software including:
  • Adobe Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere Pro, etc.)
  • AI-powered tools (Adobe Sensei, Canva, etc.)
  • Other tools such as Figma, Sketch, or equivalents.
  • Familiarity with project management tools such as Zoho, Asana, or Jira.
  • Deep understanding of design principles, typography, and color theory.
  • Excellent creativity, problem-solving abilities, and attention to detail.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and work both independently and in a team setting.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates should send their resume and portfolio to career@techstas.com with the subject line: Graphic Designer. Applications without the correct subject line may be delayed or rejected.

Contact Information:

Techstas Info Solutions (P) Ltd Module 9, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, 695581 http://www.techstas.com Contact Email: career@techstas.com

Closing Date: 15, Sept 2025 Job Published: 29, Aug 2025
summary: Techstas is looking for a Graphic Designer to create visual content across various platforms. The role involves using design and AI tools, and collaborating with multiple teams.

job_description:
Software Engineer (Full Stack - Web & Mobile)

MUTHOOT PAPPACHAN TECHNOLOGIES LTD 14th FLOOR, CARNIVAL TECHNOPARK, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM P.O., TRIVANDRUM , 695581 https://www.mptglobal.com

Closing Date: 20, Sept 2025 Job Published: 29, Aug 2025

Contact Email: vidhya.r@muthoot.com

Location: Technopark, Trivandrum (Full-time, Work from Office) Experience: 2 – 6 Years Employment Type: Permanent

About the Role

We are seeking talented and motivated Software Engineers with strong expertise in Angular, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and mobile app development (Android & iOS). The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web and mobile applications, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop, test, and deploy high-quality web and mobile applications.
  • Work on front-end development using Angular and ensure seamless user experience.
  • Build robust back-end services using Node.js with efficient database management in PostgreSQL.
  • Design, build, and maintain advanced applications for Android and iOS platforms.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Optimize applications for maximum performance, scalability, and reliability.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices in software development.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing applications.

Required Skills

  • Hands-on experience in Angular (latest versions).
  • Strong proficiency in Node.js and building RESTful APIs.
  • Experience working with PostgreSQL (queries, optimization, schema design).
  • Proficiency in Android (Java/Kotlin) and iOS (Swift/Objective-C) development.
  • Knowledge of version control systems (Git).
  • Solid understanding of software development lifecycle and agile methodologies.
  • Problem-solving skills with attention to detail.

Why Join Us

  • Exciting projects with cutting-edge technologies.
  • Opportunity to grow and work with a talented technical team.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Work-life balance with a permanent, stable role.

Preferred Skills

Angular / Node.js / PostgreSQL / Android / iOS
summary: Seeking a Software Engineer to develop web and mobile applications using Angular, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Responsibilities include front-end and back-end development, optimization, and collaboration.

job_description:
Telesales Executive - Walk-In Interview

TRAINONEX SOLUTIONS (P) Ltd is holding a walk-in interview for the position of Telesales Executive.

Walk-In Date: August 30, 2025 Time: 10:30 AM - 12:30 PM

Location: 1st FLOOR, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 1, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS PHASE 1, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA, 695581 www.trainonexsolutions.in

Contact Email: trainonexsolutions.hr@gmail.com

Brief Description

We are seeking a motivated and dynamic Telesales Executive to join our team. You will be responsible for conducting sales over the phone and maintaining good customer relationships. The goal is to help the company grow by bringing in customers and developing business. You will be expected to identify potential clients, qualify leads, and close deals. This is a great opportunity for individuals looking for a job.

  • Need Immediate Joiners
  • Work from office opportunity

Requirements

  • Experience: 0-1 years required; Freshers can also apply
  • Male and Female Candidates preferred
  • Fluency with Malayalam Language

Preferred Skills

  • Customer interaction
  • Communication
  • Time management

Walk-In Entry Pass

Candidates are requested to apply for the entry Pass to Technopark Campus to attend the Walk-In interview through mobile app/ web browser. Once the pass is applied, the entry pass will be sent to their registered mobile number/ e-mail id. The softcopy of the entry pass can be shown on their gadgets at Technopark Entrance Gate to enter into the Campus.

Candidates who do not have a smartphone can print their hardcopy of the entry pass on the scheduled date of the interview from the self-operating Kiosks placed at the Reception Building near TECHNOPARK Main Gate by using the 5 digit OTP (One Time Password) received as SMS/ e-mail.

Mobile App Click here to download the Mobile App for Android Click here to download the Mobile App for iOS

Website URL vms.technopark.org Click here for the User Manual

Note: Original certificates will be verified at the Entry Gate for the Walk-In interview entry.
summary: Trainonex Solutions is hiring a Telesales Executive for immediate joiners. This role involves phone sales, customer relationship management, and lead qualification at their Technopark office.

job_description:
SAP BW Consultant

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking an experienced SAP BW Consultant to join our team.

Contact: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Responsibilities:

  • Understand existing design and implementation BW data models (InfoProviders, DSO/ADSOs, CompositeProviders, MultiProviders, InfoCubes)
  • Document BW transformation rules, BEX formulas and maintain documentation
  • Work with standard and custom ECC extractors (e.g., extractors 2LIS, 0FI, 0CO*).
  • Debug and troubleshoot data extraction and load issues.
  • Document ABAP routines in BW transformations

Qualifications:

  • 7+ years of hands-on SAP BW development and support experience.
  • Proficiency in SAP ABAP skills
  • Proven experience with ECC extractors (standard & custom) across SD, MM, FI, CO modules.
  • Strong understanding of SAP data dictionary objects, modules, and integration with other SAP modules.
  • Strong knowledge of data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes.
  • Experience with Process Chain, scheduling and monitoring
  • Good analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail.
  • Effective communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
  • SAP certification or relevant SAP certifications are desirable but not mandatory.

Additional Information:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Fraud Alert:

Reflections Info Systems does not charge any fees for job applications. Be cautious of fraudulent job offers. We contact candidates only through our official website or LinkedIn, and all employment-related emails are sent through our official HR email ID. Please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarification/ alerts on this subject.
summary: Reflections Info Systems is seeking an experienced SAP BW Consultant. The role involves designing, developing, and implementing SAP BW solutions with a strong background in ABAP and ECC extractors.

job_description:
Delivery Manager

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking a highly experienced Delivery Manager to oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of multiple technical projects. The ideal candidate will possess strong leadership, communication, and technical skills to manage cross-functional teams and ensure customer satisfaction.

Contact Information: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Responsibilities:

  • Project Delivery Management:
  • Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of multiple technical projects.
  • Manage project scope, timelines, budgets, risks, and quality.

  • Ensure adherence to Agile/Waterfall methodologies as per project requirements.

  • Team Leadership:

  • Lead and mentor cross-functional technical teams, fostering collaboration and innovation.

  • Conduct regular performance reviews and provide growth opportunities for team members.

  • Stakeholder Engagement:

  • Act as a bridge between technical teams, business stakeholders, and clients.

  • Communicate project status, risks, and solutions effectively to all stakeholders.

  • Technical Expertise:

  • Collaborate with architects and engineers to define technical solutions.

  • Provide input on architecture, design, and implementation strategies.

  • Process Improvement:

  • Identify opportunities to improve project delivery processes and tools.

  • Implement best practices in software development and delivery.

  • Risk and Issue Management:

  • Proactively identify project risks and develop mitigation strategies.

  • Resolve technical and operational challenges in a timely manner.

  • Customer Focus:

  • Ensure customer satisfaction by delivering high-quality solutions aligned with business needs.

Preferred Skills/Experience:

  • 14 years of experience in technology delivery roles, including hands-on development and leadership responsibilities.
  • Proven experience in delivering large-scale, complex projects with diverse teams.
  • Strong understanding of modern software development practices, cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP), and DevOps.
  • Proficiency in one or more programming languages (e.g., Java, Python, .NET) is preferred.
  • Expertise in Agile, Scrum, Kanban, and traditional project management methodologies.
  • Certification such as PMP, CSM, or equivalent is an advantage.
  • Excellent team leadership, people management, and conflict resolution skills.
  • Strong communication, presentation, and negotiation abilities.

Education:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master’s degree is a plus).

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

summary: Seeking a Delivery Manager with 14+ years of experience to lead technical projects. The role involves team leadership, stakeholder engagement, and ensuring high-quality delivery.

job_description:
Data Engineering - Project Manager

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking an experienced Data Engineering Project Manager to lead the end-to-end delivery of data platform, AI, BI, and analytics projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data engineering, project management, and stakeholder management.

Responsibilities:

  • Own the end-to-end delivery of data platform, AI, BI, and analytics projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives and stakeholder expectations.
  • Develop and maintain comprehensive project plans, roadmaps, and timelines for data ingestion, transformation, governance, AI/ML models, and analytics deliverables.
  • Lead cross-functional teams including data engineers, data scientists, BI analysts, architects, and business stakeholders to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions on time and within budget.
  • Define, prioritize, and manage product and project backlogs covering data pipelines, data quality, governance, AI services, and BI dashboards or reporting tools.
  • Collaborate closely with business units to capture and translate requirements into actionable user stories and acceptance criteria for data and analytics solutions.
  • Oversee BI and analytics area including dashboard development, embedded analytics, self-service BI enablement, and ad hoc reporting capabilities.
  • Ensure data quality, lineage, security, and compliance requirements are integrated throughout the project lifecycle, in collaboration with governance and security teams.
  • Coordinate UAT, performance testing, and user training to ensure adoption and successful rollout of data and analytics products.
  • Act as the primary point of contact for all project stakeholders, providing regular status updates, managing risks and issues, and escalating as necessary.
  • Facilitate agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, backlog grooming, demos, and retrospectives, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
  • Drive post-deployment monitoring and optimization of data and BI solutions to meet evolving business needs and performance standards.

Preferred Skills:

  • Overall 13+ Years of Experience in IT with 6+ years of experience as a Technical Product Manager, Technical Program Manager, or Delivery Lead.
  • Hands-on development experience in data engineering, including data pipelines, ETL processes, and data integration workflows
  • Proven track record managing data engineering, analytics, or AI/ML projects end to end
  • Solid understanding of modern data architecture: data lakes, warehouses, pipelines, ETL/ELT, governance, and AI tooling
  • Hands-on familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS, GCP) and DataOps/MLOps practices
  • Strong knowledge of Agile methodologies, sprint planning, and backlog grooming
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, including working with senior execs and technical leads
  • Background in computer science, engineering, data science, or analytics
  • Experience or Solid Understanding with data engineering tools and services in AWS, Azure & GCP
  • Exposure or Solid Understanding of BI, Analytics, LLMs, RAG, prompt engineering, or agent-based AI systems
  • Experience leading cross-functional teams in matrixed environments
  • Certifications: PMP, CSM, SAFe, or equivalent are a plus

Contact Information:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Company Information:

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 http://www.reflectionsglobal.com

Important Notice:

Reflections Info Systems does not charge any fee for job applications. Be cautious of fraudulent job offers. Contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarification.
summary: Reflections Info Systems is hiring a Data Engineering Project Manager to oversee data platform, AI, and BI projects. The role involves leading teams, managing project lifecycles, and ensuring data quality and alignment with business goals.

job_description:
Technical Project Manager (Application Development)

Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd is seeking a highly experienced Technical Project Manager to lead the end-to-end execution of custom application development and integration projects. These projects are primarily built on .NET stacks with modern client frameworks and integration platforms.

Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com

Brief Description: The ideal candidate will have a strong technical foundation and project delivery expertise, capable of driving complex, cross-functional initiatives from discovery through production rollout. This role requires hands-on experience across the full software/product development lifecycle, including planning, estimation, design, development, testing, and release, while working closely with engineering, product, and client stakeholders.

Responsibilities:

  • Manage end-to-end delivery of custom software development and integration projects using Java, .NET, and related technologies.
  • Create and maintain project plans, define timelines, identify dependencies, and track progress.
  • Coordinate with cross-functional teams including developers, QA, UI/UX, and DevOps to ensure smooth execution.
  • Oversee all stages of the SDLC: requirements finalization, development, integration, testing (unit, system, UAT, NFR), and deployment.
  • Work closely with architects and leads to ensure alignment with technical direction and design.
  • Identify and manage risks, scope changes, and schedule adjustments proactively.
  • Serve as the primary point of contact for clients and stakeholders, providing regular updates and resolving issues.
  • Ensure quality and timely delivery through effective team coordination and clear communication.

Preferred Skills/Experience:

  • 13+ years of overall IT experience, with 4–6 years of Technical Project Management experience.
  • Strong understanding of custom application development on Java/.NET stacks.
  • Experience managing:
  • Backend/API development
  • Integration using tools like Apache Camel, IBM Integration Stack
  • Database interactions (Oracle, SQL Server)
  • Client-side development using React/Angular
  • Deployment on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure)
  • Familiarity with Microservices architecture, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices.

Project Management Expertise:

  • Expertise in schedule planning, effort estimation, dependency tracking, and delivery monitoring.
  • Hands-on experience in scope and schedule change management, stakeholder communication, and issue escalation.
  • Tools: Jira, Confluence, MS Project, Git, Jenkins, or equivalent.

Secondary Skills:

  • Experience managing globally distributed teams.
  • Strong understanding of enterprise-level integrations and technology ecosystems.

Soft Skills:

  • Excellent communication and stakeholder engagement capabilities.
  • Strong leadership, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
  • Ability to articulate technical topics to both technical and non-technical audiences.

Contact Information:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice: Reflections Info Systems does not ask for fees for job opportunities. Be cautious of fraudulent job offers. All official communications come through the official website or LinkedIn, and employment-related emails are sent via the official HR email address. For any clarifications, contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.

Closing Date: 05, Sept 2025 Job Published: 29, Aug 2025
summary: Reflections Info Systems seeks a Technical Project Manager to lead custom application development, primarily on .NET stacks. The role involves managing SDLC stages, coordinating teams, and ensuring timely project delivery.

job_description:
Junior Software Developer

ECESIS CARE (P) Ltd 4th FLOOR, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA , 695581 https://www.ecesistech.com

Closing Date: 15, Sept 2025 Job Published: 28, Aug 2025 Contact Email: amrithas@ecesistech.com

Brief Description

We are looking for a motivated and enthusiastic Junior Software Developer to join our growing team. As a Junior Developer, you will work under the guidance of senior team members to contribute to software development projects, assist with bug fixes, and gain exposure to both frontend and backend technologies. This is an excellent opportunity to learn and grow in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Assist in the development, testing, and maintenance of web applications.
  • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code under senior developer guidance.
  • Support debugging, troubleshooting, and fixing software issues.
  • Collaborate with the team to integrate APIs, services, and databases.
  • Participate in code reviews, learn best practices, and contribute to knowledge sharing.
  • Work with version control systems and follow agile development processes.
  • Stay eager to learn new technologies and improve technical skills.

Preferred Skills

Primary Skills (Must-Have):

  • Basic understanding of frontend technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and a framework like Angular or React.
  • Exposure to backend technologies such as Node.js, PHP, Python (FastAPI), or Laravel.
  • Familiarity with databases (SQL/NoSQL) and basic querying.
  • Knowledge of RESTful APIs and integration techniques.
  • Strong problem-solving ability and willingness to learn quickly.

Preferred Skills:

  • Familiarity with version control systems (Git).
  • Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
  • Basic knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and deployment practices.
  • Awareness of UI/UX principles and responsive design.

Key Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree (or pursuing) in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
  • 1–2 years of relevant work experience.
  • Strong passion for coding, problem-solving, and continuous learning.
  • Good communication and teamwork skills.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates can send their updated resume to amrithas@ecesistech.com with the subject line: "Application for Junior Software Developer @ Ecesis".
summary: Ecesis Care is looking for a Junior Software Developer to assist in web application development. The role involves coding, debugging, and collaborating with senior developers.

job_description:
Senior Software Developer

ECESIS CARE (P) Ltd

4th FLOOR, M SQUARED BUILDING, ANNEX 2, TECHNOPARK CAMPUS, KARIYAVATTOM, TRIVANDRUM, KERALA , 695581

https://www.ecesistech.com

Closing Date: 15, Sept 2025

Job Published: 28, Aug 2025

Contact Email: amrithas@ecesistech.com

Job Description:

We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled Senior Software Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex software solutions across the full technology stack. You will work closely with stakeholders, lead technical discussions, mentor junior developers, and ensure that our applications are scalable, secure, and optimized for performance.

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, test, and deploy high-quality web applications using modern frontend and backend technologies.
  • Lead the architectural design of scalable, maintainable, and secure software solutions.
  • Collaborate with product owners, designers, and cross-functional teams to define technical requirements and deliver robust features.
  • Review code, provide mentorship, and guide junior and mid-level developers to follow best practices.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize applications for maximum performance and scalability.
  • Ensure seamless integration of APIs, third-party services, and databases.
  • Contribute to the improvement of software development processes, coding standards, and agile practices.
  • Stay updated with emerging technologies and proactively suggest improvements.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills (Must-Have):

  • Strong expertise in frontend technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular/React (or similar frameworks).
  • Solid backend development experience with Node.js, PHP, Python (FastAPI), .NET, or Laravel.
  • Strong understanding of RESTful API development and integration.
  • Proficiency in working with databases (SQL & NoSQL) and optimizing queries.
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Strong knowledge of software architecture and design patterns.
  • Proficiency with version control (Git) and CI/CD practices.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with microservices architecture and distributed systems.
  • Familiarity with DevOps practices, monitoring tools, and automated testing frameworks.
  • Knowledge of content management systems (WordPress, Ghost, etc.).

Key Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
  • 5+ years of professional software development experience.
  • Proven track record of leading technical projects and mentoring developers.
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  • Strong ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates can send their updated resume to amrithas@ecesistech.com with the subject line: "Application for Senior Software Developer @ Ecesis".
summary: Ecesis is seeking a Senior Software Developer to design, develop, and maintain complex software solutions. The role involves leading projects, mentoring developers, and ensuring application scalability and security.

job_description:
Senior iOS Developer - Native (Remote)

Reizend (P) Ltd SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 http://www.reizendretail.in

Contact: careers@reizend.ai

About the Role:

We are seeking an experienced Senior iOS Developer with strong expertise in native iOS application development and working knowledge of modern frontend frameworks (React.js/Next.js). The ideal candidate is passionate about building scalable, secure, and high-performing mobile applications, while also being able to contribute to frontend web experiences when needed. You will work closely with product managers, UI/UX designers, backend engineers, and QA teams to deliver seamless, intuitive, and high-quality digital experiences across mobile and web platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Architect, design, and develop native iOS applications using Swift (and Objective-C where necessary).
  • Implement modular and reusable UI components with UIKit/SwiftUI for scalable app architectures.
  • Integrate RESTful and GraphQL APIs, manage authentication flows (OAuth2, JWT, Cognito, Firebase Auth).
  • Optimize mobile performance with background threading, caching strategies, lazy loading, Core Data, and efficient memory management.
  • Maintain App Store compliance, provisioning profiles, and release processes.
  • Contribute to frontend features using React.js/Next.js (SSR, SSG, state management, responsive UI).
  • Collaborate on performance optimization techniques: code splitting, asset optimization, lazy hydration (for web), and mobile battery/data usage improvements.
  • Enforce mobile and web security best practices: secure storage (Keychain), encrypted communication, input validation, and prevention of OWASP Mobile Top 10 vulnerabilities.
  • Conduct unit, integration, and UI tests using XCTest, Jest, Cypress, or Playwright.
  • Utilize modern DevOps practices for CI/CD pipelines (Fastlane, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI).
  • Participate in sprint planning, peer reviews, design discussions, and technical documentation.
  • Leverage AI-powered developer tools (GitHub Copilot, Cursor, or custom LLM-based agents) to accelerate feature delivery and improve code quality.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

  • Bachelors/Masters in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent.
  • 6–12 years of professional experience in mobile application development.
  • Strong proficiency in Swift, Objective-C, Xcode, UIKit, SwiftUI, CoreData, and iOS SDKs.
  • Experience with React.js/Next.js for frontend development (state management: Redux, Zustand, Recoil).
  • Solid knowledge of mobile networking, REST/GraphQL API integration, WebSockets, and offline sync strategies.
  • Hands-on experience with App Store submission, TestFlight, and CI/CD automation.
  • Strong understanding of mobile app security, accessibility, and responsive UI/UX.
  • Proficient in Git workflows, CocoaPods/SPM, npm/yarn, and modern IDEs.
  • Skilled in writing automated unit, UI, and end-to-end tests.
  • Exposure to containerized environments (Docker) and cloud integrations (Firebase, AWS, or GCP).
  • Familiarity with cross-platform development (React Native or Flutter) is a plus.

Professional Attributes:

  • Passion for clean, maintainable, and scalable code.
  • Strong problem-solving skills with a focus on user experience and performance.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration abilities across cross-functional teams.
  • Ability to mentor junior developers and contribute to technical decision-making.
  • Proactive and adaptable mindset, with ownership over end-to-end delivery.

Work Mode: Remote

Experience Required: 6 + Years

Salary Package: 20-30 LPA
summary: Seeking a Senior iOS Developer to build high-performing native applications and contribute to frontend development. Requires strong proficiency in Swift, React.js and experience with mobile app security.

Job Published: 28, Aug 2025

Brief Description:

We are seeking a dynamic HR Generalist with 2+ years of experience in the IT/Software industry. The ideal candidate will manage core HR operations, full-cycle recruitment, payroll, compliance, and employee engagement initiatives. The role also requires strong communication and writing skills to support internal communications and content creation.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Handle end-to-end IT recruitment including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and onboarding.
  • Manage payroll processing, attendance tracking, and ensure statutory compliance (PF, ESI, etc.).
  • Serve as the first point of contact for employee queries, grievance handling, and HR support.
  • Assist with performance management, appraisal processes, and HR analytics.
  • Plan and organize employee engagement programs, training sessions, and internal communication activities.
  • Draft and manage HR-related content, policies, and official communications.
  • Maintain and update HR records, policies, and documentation accurately.

  • Minimum 2 years of experience as an HR Executive/HR Generalist, preferably in the IT industry.

job_description:
Graphic Designer

GAUDE BUSINESS SOLUTIONS (P) Ltd Ground Floor, Amstor House, Technopark Phase 1, Trivandrum, Kerala, India, 695581 http://www.gaudesolutions.com

Contact Email: careers@gaudesolutions.com

Closing Date: 15, Sept 2025 Job Published: 28, Aug 2025

Brief Description

Kidomo, a Gaude client project, aims to enhance joy for kids and young adults through personalized products. From custom school supplies to apparel and gifts, Kidomo targets young parents (children up to 15) and teens/young adults (15-21).

Role Overview

Kidomo seeks a creative and detail-oriented Graphic Designer to create engaging, child-friendly visuals for custom products. You'll work with content and marketing teams, designing assets that appeal to kids and parents, reflecting Kidomo’s playful brand.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design vibrant graphics for custom products (storybook illustrations, covers, packaging, merchandise) with children’s names/photos.
  • Develop digital assets for social media, marketing, website banners, email campaigns, and influencer collaborations.
  • Collaborate with writers, marketers, and product teams to create cohesive visuals for campaigns targeting young parents and kids up to 21.
  • Maintain and evolve Kidomo’s visual brand guidelines, ensuring accessibility and age-appropriateness.
  • Contribute to product ideation with new creative concepts for personalized merchandise.
  • Prepare artwork for print and digital production, ensuring high-quality output.
  • Stay updated on trends in children’s design, youth aesthetics, family brands, and digital illustration techniques.

Required Skills and Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, Visual Communication, or related field.
  • 2+ years of experience designing for children’s brands, consumer products, or family-focused campaigns.
  • Strong portfolio showcasing kid-centric design work with playful, personalized designs.
  • Proficiency in design tools: Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign, Canva, or equivalent.
  • Familiarity with preparing print-ready artwork and understanding print production processes.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
  • Eye for color, typography, and composition suited to a young audience.

Preferred Skills

  • Basic animation or motion graphics skills for social media.
  • Familiarity with web and mobile design standards for kids/family audiences.
  • Knowledge of accessibility practices in design for children and parents.
  • Collaborative approach with writers, editors, and marketers.

Kidomo Values

Creativity, empathy, playfulness, and passion for elevating kids’ experiences.
summary: We're seeking a Graphic Designer for Kidomo, a personalized product brand. You'll design engaging visuals for kids and parents, maintaining brand guidelines and contributing to product ideation.
